TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Dāvis_Bertāns, title = Dāvis_Bertāns, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dāvis_Bertāns} }

S.FORM: Dāvis Bertāns nalecuhan i Valmiera, Latvia, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Dāvis Bertāns i 2001 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 2 ku uwac atu silsil 42, namapili' tu nu Indiana Pacers putiput. 11 bulad 12 demiad, 1992 a mihca, Dāvis Bertāns, miunduay.

Dāvis Bertāns nalecohan i Valmiera, Latvia, nano syobay kanas-mali miondoay no Amilika NBA nisakapot, pahanhanan to kawaw ayza. Dāvis Bertāns i 2001 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 2 ko owac ato silsil 42, namapili' to no Indiana Pacers potipot. 11 bolad 12 demiad, 1992 a mihca, Dāvis Bertāns, miondoay.
